name: Wizard vs robot Vr Game
description:
fly with your broom across the sky and kill the robot in this VR game with intuitive movement controls and intelligent enemy AI

CONTROLS

stand at the centre of the broom , forward is the wooden end of the broom 
grab objects : grip near item
turn right : lean right
turn left : lean left 
go upward : move weight to back of broom 
go down : move weight to front of broom 
shoot with wand in hand : index trigger  

hunt and kill the robot snake 
don't crash into rocks 
future updates coming soon 

NOTE:  Wizard vs Robot was created as a part of the VR jam submission in 72 hours 
assets were partly created by me and from online sources with appropriate licenses
